name: VAMP Network
description:
🦇 VAMP Network 🦇
Welcome to the world of Vampy, our adorable kawaii vampire 🧛‍♂️ With a bold mission:
To build a rare, community-driven, and sustainable token on the Solana ecosystem.

🌙 Key Features

🔒 Limited Supply — Only 100,000,000 VAMP, balancing accessibility and scarcity.

🪙 Progressive Staking — Rewards range from 4% to 8%, with 3 tiers to incentivize loyalty and promote sustainable growth.

🦇 Kawaii & Dark Community — A unique world of adorable bats and mysterious vibes — cute meets cryptic.

🏰 Long-Term Vision — A transparent and evolving ecosystem built around VAMP Network.

💬 Join the Night Clan

➡️ Discord: https://discord.gg/MghUGzNF

➡️ Website: https://mib0007.github.io/vampnetwork.github.io/

✨ Be part of the nocturnal clan and help us make the moon 🌕 shine above the crypto community!
